Text: Salish Mountains:  Much of the range is bordered on the east by Flathead Lake.

2:
--------------------
Text: Salish Mountains:  With peaks ranging from just under 7,000 feet tall to named hills that are a little short of 3,600 feet in elevation the Salish Mountain range is a lesser known mountain range in northwestern Montana.
Triplets:<Salish Mountains
3:
--------------------
<Text: Salish Mountains:  Many of the peaks in the range are rounded tree-covered summits but occasionally the mountain summits are found on open grassy slopes that afford great views into the surrounding valleys and neighboring mountain ranges.>
